mapper.sql: id, name, value, type, sort, parent_id, status, create_time, update_time, create_by_id, update_by_id, remake
mapper.select:
select * from sys_dict
order by type,sort asc,value asc LIMIT #{startRow},#{pageSize}
select * from sys_dict where status=0 and type=#{type} order by sort

update sys_dict
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by_id = #{createById,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_by_id = #{updateById,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remake = #{remake,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_dict set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by_id = #{createById,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_by_id = #{updateById,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remake = #{remake,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
